title: Life With Judy Garland Me And My Shadows Extended Complete Minis
description: Full two-part miniseries DVD rip of the 2001 TV movie "Life With Judy Garland: Me And My Shadows" starring Judy Davis, Tammy Blanchard, Hugh Laurie and Victor Garber. I previously uploaded the 170-minute DVD rip of the shorter version which was initially released by Miramax. This version is 18 minutes longer (188 minutes) and in non-anamorphic 1:85.1 widescreen format. Davis and Blanchard both received Emmy awards for their remarkable performances as Garland. I combined both parts of the movie into one file so they play back-to-back. I will seed for as long as other people continue seeding. Enjoy!
